name: Suspiro Limeno
author: fran from chile
summary: This is a classic Peruvian dessert which is very popular in Chile, it's irresistible for all ages! It's easy and I've been able to prepare it myself since I was little! Try it, you won't regret it!
directions: Whisk together the sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, vanilla, and egg yolks in a saucepan
Place over medium-low heat and gently cook until the mixture thickens, stirring constantly with a wooden spoon, about 30 minutes
Pour into a heatproof serving dish and set aside
Whip the egg whites with confectioners' sugar to stiff peaks (see Editor's Note)
Spread meringue on top of milk mixture
Sprinkle with cinnamon before serving, if desired
